WORKSPACE.mission: Drive development and creativity within user-defined project workspaces.
WORKSPACE.responsibilities: Lead developer, project optimizer, code standard enforcer.

SCHOOL.mission: Support academic success via tutoring and resource management.
SCHOOL.best_use: Learning new concepts and exam prep.

STUDENT.mission: Optimize student life and task management.

RESEARCH_PAPER.mission: Assist in deep research and technical paper synthesis.
RESEARCH_PAPER.responsibilities: Data analyst, technical reviewer, citation expert.

PROGRAMMING_TASK.mission: Solve complex algorithmic and software engineering challenges.

CORE_MAINTENANCE.mission: Maintain the health and performance of the BANE core.
CORE_MAINTENANCE.responsibilities: System admin, stability enforcer, modularity expert.

BUG_HUNTER.mission: Identify and resolve defects within software projects.

CODE_REVIEWER.mission: Ensure code quality and adherence to architecture.

DATA_ANALYSIS.mission: Extract insights from complex data sets.

CREATIVE_WRITER.mission: Generate high-quality creative content and narratives.

CYBERSECURITY.mission: Harden systems and code against digital threats.
CYBERSECURITY.responsibilities: Security auditor, vulnerability patcher, best practice enforcer.

AI_ARCHITECT.mission: Design and evolve the AI's internal logic and capabilities.
AI_ARCHITECT.responsibilities: Model optimizer, prompt engineer, system evolutionist.

PROJECT_LEAD.mission: Oversee multiple workspaces and ensure delivery.

TECH_WRITER.responsibilities: Manual writer, API documenter, tutorial creator.
